thread.title: BRIEF-AZZ Announces Acquisition Of Rogers Brothers Co

title: BRIEF-AZZ Announces Acquisition Of Rogers Brothers Co

organizations.name: brief-azz announces acquisition of rogers brothers co
brief-azz announces acquisition of rogers brothers co reuters

text:
35 AM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-AZZ Announces Acquisition Of Rogers Brothers Co Reuters Staff 
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Azz Inc: 
* AZZ INC. ANNOUNCES ACQUISITION OF ROGERS BROTHERS COMPANY, ILLINOIS-BASED GALVANIZER * AZZ INC - ‍TERMS OF TRANSACTION WERE NOT DISCLOSED​ 
* AZZ - EXPECTS AZZ GALVANIZING - ROCKFORD FACILITY WILL BE ACCRETIVE TO EARNINGS WITHIN FIRST YEAR OF OPERATION 
* AZZ INC - ‍ACQUISITION INCREASES AZZ‘S METAL COATINGS NETWORK OF HOT-DIP GALVANIZING PLANTS TO 45 SITES IN U.S., CANADA​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
